string.name: cat_switch_title
string.description: Title of demo for the component Switch. [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]

string.name: cat_switch_description
string.description: The description of demo for the component Switch. [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]

resources.string: The Switch provides a single element that toggles between two states.

string.name: cat_switch_color_guide
string.description: The description of how switches look like when enabled. [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]

resources.string: Switch elements respond to changes in colorSecondary

string.name: cat_switch_disabled_guide
string.description: The description of how switches look like when disabled. [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]

resources.string: Switch elements that are disabled cannot be interacted with and will appear faded.

string.name: cat_switch_icon_guide
string.description: The description of how switches look like with icon. [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]

resources.string: Switch elements with an icon, default size (16dp) and 24dp.

string.name: cat_switch_enabled
string.description: The label of enabled switches. [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]

string.name: cat_switch_disabled
string.description: The label of disabled switches. [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]

string.name: cat_switch_toggleable_description
string.description: The label explaining the function of a switch which toggles the state of enabling of the example switches. [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]

resources.string: Turn this switch On to control the enabled state of the switches below.

string.name: cat_switch_toggle
string.description: The label of example switches. [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]

string.name: cat_switch_deprecated
string.description: The title of the section that shows deprecated SwitchMaterial. [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]
